therian.operator.addall

Class GenericAddAllOperator

  • java.lang.Object
    • therian.operator.addall.GenericAddAllOperator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Operator<AddAll<?,?>>

    @StandardOperator
@Operator.DependsOn(value={AddToCollection.class,AddToListIterator.class,IterableToList.class,EnumerationToList.class,DefaultToListConverter.class})
public class GenericAddAllOperator
extends Object
implements Operator<AddAll<?,?>>
    Attempts to convert source to Iterable, then Add each element to target. Expressly rejects array targets in favor of AddAllToArray, which is more efficient for this job.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • supports

        public boolean supports(TherianContext context,
               AddAll<?,?> addAll)
        Description copied from interface: Operator
        Learn whether an operation is supported. This check can be fairly perfunctory as the evaluation of a given Operation sets an associated success status, thus just because an Operation is deemed to be "supported" does not guarantee it will be successfully evaluated.
        Specified by:
        supports in interface Operator<AddAll<?,?>>
        Parameters:
        context - active
        addAll - to check
        Returns:
        true if supported
